Inn Fang wrote:

>
> Hi,
>
> Thanks for the reply. I just realized that I have to specify the
> proxy host and port. May I know where I should specify it?

When on the job 'settings' page, scroll down to 'fetch-processors'.  See 
the 'HTTP' processor.  If 'expert settings' are enabled -- you do this 
by clicking the 'View expert settings' link toward the top of the 
settings page -- you'll see the attributes, http-proxy-host and 
http-proxy-port.
Good luck,
St.Ack

>
> Inn Fang
>
